text: Ke Eena ea romellang liphefo joaloka lirumuli tse phatlalatsang litaba tse molemo tsa mohau oa Hae, ho fihlela li roetse maru a boima ke pula, e be re li romella mobung o shoeleng, joale ke moo re tla theolela pula holimâ€™a ona eo ka eona re hlahisang litholoana tsa mefuta. Ke kamoo re tla tsosa ba shoeleng kateng, e le hore le tle le hopole
